suite.name: Signup

test.name: Não deve cadastrar com senha de 5 caracteres

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h1[contains(., 'Faça seu cadastro')]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'João Silva' into text field 'xpath=//input[@id='name']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Alerta no formulario
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//small[text()="Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 digitos"]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.arg: Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 digitos

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Verifica se o sistema valida o tamanho da senha no cadastro de usuário

test.name: Não deve cadastrar com senha de 4 caracteres
